Oracle Text: [RULING] R125 Black Reflection: After resolving the attack, treat the targeted card as though it was played by your opponent. If it would be shuffled into a Life Deck after use, your opponent shuffles it into their Life Deck. You may target any attack card, including Setups that perform attacks. You may not target cards that conditionally perform attacks, such as Allies.

name: Supreme Kai - Ready for Battle
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Choose up to 5 cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your Life Deck. 
POWER: Draw the bottom card of your discard pile.

name: Supreme Kai - Combatant
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Life Deck and put them back in any order. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
You may shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Life Deck to draw the same number of cards. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Videl - Student
Text:
[CONSTANT]: When you perform an attack that uses AT, raise your anger 1 level. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
DAMAGE: AT Stages. 
HIT: Gain 5 stages or destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

name: Videl - Heroic
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your AT is considered to be 3 for your attacks. 
POWER: You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels or your effects that destroy cards from the top of your opponent's Life Deck have that amount increased by 1 this combat.

name: Videl - Learning the Moves
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your AT is considered to be 4 for your attacks. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Place a Setup or Drill in play on top of their owner's Life Deck or use a critical damage effect and this attack is considered to deal critical damage. 
DAMAGE: AT stages.

name: Videl - Battle Hardened
Text:
[CONSTANT]: When you perform an attack, your AT is considered to be 5 for that attack or it gains "HIT: Destroy the top 2 cards of your opponent's Life Deck." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Gain 10 stages or Rejuvenate 3. 
DAMAGE: AT +5 stages.

name: Dabura - Sinister Presence
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks with Sword in the title gain "HIT: Raise your anger 1 level." 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Search the top 5 cards of your Life Deck for a Named card or card with Sword in the title and place it into your hand. If that card is a Setup or Drill, you may place it into play instead. Shuffle the remaining cards into your Life Deck.

name: Dabura - Second in Command
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks with Sword in the title deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Search your discard pile for a Styled or Named card with Sword in the title and place it into your hand.

name: Dabura - Majin Warrior
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks with Sword in the title cannot have their damage prevented. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. Choose 3 cards in your opponent's discard pile and banish them. You may discard a card with Sword in the title from your hand. If you do, you may use this attack a second time this combat. 
DAMAGE: 7 stages.

name: Dabura - Enraged
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks with Sword in the title deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage and gain All of your opponent's personalities lose 2 stages. 
POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for a card with Sword in the title and place it into your hand.

name: Hercule - The World Champ
Text:
(Your Life deck cannot include cards that perform energy attacks.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your non-Styled attacks cannot have their damage modified by your effects. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Search your Life Deck for Hercule's Championship Belt and play it. 
DAMAGE: 4 stages. HIT: Raise your anger 2 levels.

name: Yamcha - Suited Up
Text:
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 2 life cards. 
HIT: Stops the next energy attack performed against you this combat.

name: Goku - Super Saiyan God
Text: POWER: Destroy the top card of your Life Deck to draw a card.

name: Captain Ginyu - Body Change
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your "Ginyu Force" Allies may make actions regardless of your MP's power stage and they cannot be discarded. Your attacks deal +2 life cards of damage.

name: Captain Ginyu - Frog
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your Allies may make actions regardless of your MP's power stage and they cannot be discarded. Your attacks deal +X life cards of damage. X = The number of Allies you have in play when you perform that attack.

name: Trunks - Defiant
Text: POWER: Place a card from your hand on the top or bottom of your Life Deck to choose an attack card thaht is Styled or has 'Sword' in the title from your discard pile and place it into your hand. Your opponent skips their next action this combat.

name: Supreme Kai - Mysterious
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Choose up to 2 cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your Life Deck. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Search your Life Deck for a [GOD] ally and play it. 
DAMAGE: 1 life card.

name: Supreme Kai - Shin
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's Life Deck and put them back in any order. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attacks costing 2 stages. 
Choose up to 2 cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 3 life cards. HIT: You may discard a card to draw the bottom card of your discard pile.

name: Supreme Kai - Ready for Battle
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Choose up to 5 cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your Life Deck. 
POWER: Draw the bottom card of your discard pile.

name: Supreme Kai - Combatant
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Life Deck and put them back in any order. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
You may shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Life Deck to draw the same number of cards. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Videl - Student
Text:
[CONSTANT]: When you perform an attack that uses AT, raise your anger 1 level. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
DAMAGE: AT Stages. 
HIT: Gain 5 stages or destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

name: Videl - Heroic
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your AT is considered to be 3 for your attacks. 
POWER: You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels or your effects that destroy cards from the top of your opponent's Life Deck have that amount increased by 1 this combat.

name: Videl - Learning the Moves
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your AT is considered to be 4 for your attacks. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Place a Setup or Drill in play on top of their owner's Life Deck or use a critical damage effect and this attack is considered to deal critical damage. 
DAMAGE: AT stages.

name: Videl - Battle Hardened
Text:
[CONSTANT]: When you perform an attack, your AT is considered to be 5 for that attack or it gains "HIT: Destroy the top 2 cards of your opponent's Life Deck." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Gain 10 stages or Rejuvenate 3. 
DAMAGE: AT +5 stages.

name: Nail - Warrior
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever your opponent stops one of your attacks, destroy the top card of their Life Deck. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when you perform a Styled attack. Your MP pays 1 stage to make that attack gain, "If stopped, use this attack's HIT effects" and "Banish after use."

name: Nappa - Supportive
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +2 stages of damage. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. 
DAMGE: AT +2 stages. HIT: Destroy a Drill.

name: Vegeta - The Crown Prince
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks without "anger" printed in the text-box gain "Raise your anger 1 level." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. This attack is considered to deal critical damage. 
DAMAGE: 4 stages.

name: Black Viewing Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: After your opponent discards a card from their hand by a card effect during combat, destroy the top card of their Life Deck.

name: Black Capture
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 3 stages. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. 
HIT: Attach to your opponent's MP. At the beginning of each turn, your opponent banishes the top card of their Life Deck. Banish this card when your opponent deals critical damage.

name: Blue Dominance
Text:
(You cannot win by MPPV if you use this card.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Advance or lower your MP to level 2. Choose up to 2 Drills in your discard pile and place them into play. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Namekian Overhead Blast
Text:
(If this card is banished for Endurance, your Dragon Balls cannot be captured this combat.) 
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. 
HIT: Rejuvenate X. X = your MP's level.

name: Orange Captivity Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your Energy Combat attacks gain "HIT: Raise your anger 1 and your MP gains 3 stages."

name: Orange Energy Catch
Text:
[DEFENSE] Stops an energy attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. For the remainder of combat, all of your attacks deal +2 stages of damage.

name: Red Relaxation
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Use a critical damage effect. Your MP gains 2 stages. Draw the bottom card of your discard pile. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Red Static Shot
Text:
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. 
Your opponent cannot use Endurance on your Styled attacks this combat. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. 
HIT: Raise your anger 2.

name: Dragon Radar
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
POWER: Search your Life Deck for a Dragon Ball and play it. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Playful Punch
Text:
(If the highest power level on your MP's Level 4 is 5000,000 or less, you may play this card top stop a non-Styled attack instead of as an attack.) 
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Your MP gains 5 stages. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 3 life cards.

name: Wall Breaker
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Attach to your opponent's MP. While attached, your opponent cannot gain anger. Banish this card when your opponent deals critical damage. 
DAMAGE: AT +1 stage.

name: Defiant Challenge
Text:
POWER: Search your Banished Zone for a Named card and place it on top of your Life Deck. Search your Life Deck for a Named attack card and place it into your hand. Your opponent may discard a card from their hand to search their Life Deck for a Named attack card and place it into their hand. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Heroic Dashing Punch
Text:
(Heroes only. Limit 2 per deck.) 
[ATTACK] Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. Your opponent skips their next action this combat. For the remainder of combat, life card damage from attacks is banished. 
DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Your opponent cannot gain anger this combat. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Confrontation
Text:
(Heroes only.) 
POWER: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent shuffles that card into their Life Deck.

name: Stare Down
Text:
(Villains only.) 
POWER: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent discards that card.

name: Heroic Energy Sphere
Text:
(Heroes only.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when an Event is played. Cancel the effects of that card. Rejuvenate 1.

name: Villainous Energy Sphere
Text:
(Villains only.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when an Event is played. Cancel the effects of that card. Your opponent destroys the top card of their Life Deck.

name: Black Focus
Text:
(You may only have one Black Focus attached. If this card is discarded from your hand during combat, place it into play.) 
POWER: Attach to your MP. The next attack you perform this combat gains If this attack deals critical damage, draw a card. While attached, whenever an effect would raise your anger, you may banish the top card of your opponent's discard pile instead.

name: Black Glare
Text:
(Limit 2 per deck.) 
POWER: Your opponent plays with their hand revealed until the start of your next turn. 
[ANDROID]: If you have 2 or less Traits, search your Life Deck for a Styled Setup or Styled Drill and play it. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Black Gut Check
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Choose a random card from your opponent's hand and reveal it. If that card is a [SHIELD] card, this attack cannot be stopped. 
DAMAGE: AT +4 stages. HIT: Raise or lower both players' anger 2 levels. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Black Pressure Point
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. You may discard a card from your hand to lower your opponent's anger 1 level and place a Styled card from your discard pile on top of your Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Black Energy Rings
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 3 stages. 
If this attack is stopped, your next Styled attack this combat cannot be stopped. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. 
HIT: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. (Banish after use.)

name: Blue Rivalry Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your opponent's attacks deal -1 stage and -1 life card of damage. If your MP is level 2 your opponent cannot use effects that change your level.

name: Blue Absorption
Text:
[DEFENSE] POWER: Prevent all damage from an attack. 
You may discard a card from your hand to perform a copy of that attack for your next action. 
[ALIEN]: If you do, that attack is considered to deal critical damage. Raise or lower a player's anger 2 levels. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Blue Security
Text:
[DEFENSE] Stops a physical attack. 
You may banish an Ally you control. If you do, search your Life Deck or discard pile for a Styled Drill and place it into play.

name: Blue Combined Effort
Text:
(This attack's cost must be payed by an Ally you control, regardless of your MP's power stage.) 
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 4 stages. Damage from this attack cannot be modified. 
DAMAGE: 10 life cards. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Blue Energy Ricochet
Text:
[DEFENSE] Stops an energy attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. Until the end of your next turn, after you use a Setup, lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

name: Namekian Manipulation Drill
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever a Dragon Ball enters or leaves play, banish the bottom card of your opponent's discard pile. 
[GOD]: Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when your opponent captures a Dragon Ball. Your opponent cannot use its immediate effects.

name: Namekian Empowering Drill
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Look at the top 2 cards of your Life Deck and place any number of them on the top or bottom of your Life Deck. 
POWER: Gain 2 stages. If your MP has 2 or less Traits, choose a Styled [ATTACK] card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck.

name: Namekian Rush
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 5 stages. 
(Shuffle this card into your Life Deck after use.)

name: Namekian Destruction
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
If you control 3 or more Dragon Balls, you may destroy a Setup, Drill, or Ally. If your MP has 2 or less Traits, choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Namekian Reinforced Blast
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 1 stage. 
Destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 2 life cards. 
HIT: You may banish a Dragon Ball you own in play. If you do, destroy the top 4 cards of your opponent's Life Deck.

name: Orange Attraction Drill
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: [EARTHLING]: Use at the start of your Rejuvenation Step. Choose a Styled card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when an opponent's effect would cause another Styled Drill you control to leave play. Destroy the top 4 cards of your Life Deck to cancel that effect.

name: Orange Intensity Drill
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 life card of damage. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after performing a successful Styled attack. Damage from that attack cannot be prevented.

name: Orange Beatdown
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Your Styled Drills cannot leave play until the beginning of your next action this combat. Raise your anger 2 levels. 
DAMAGE: 5 stages. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Orange Elbow Rush
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. 
HIT: Search your Life Deck for a Styled Drill and place it into play.

name: Orange Energy Ball
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
You may destroy a Drill or Setup you control to search your Life Deck for a Styled Drill or Styled Setup and place it into play. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards.
(Banish after use.)

name: Red Quickness Drill
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled physical attacks deal +1 stage of damage. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Draw a card. Discard a card from your hand.

name: Red Burn
Text:
POWER: Use a critical damage effect. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. 
[EARTHLING]: Gain 5 stages. If the highest power level on your MP's level 4 is 500000 or greater, shuffle into your Life Deck after use.

name: Red Dual Punch
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. Banish the top card of each player's discard pile. 
[NAMEKIAN]: This attack gains "HIT: Rejuvenate 3. If your anger level is 4 or greater this attack cannot be stopped." 
DAMAGE: AT +4 stages. (Banish after use.)

name: Red Sleeper Hold
Text:
(When this attack is performed from your discard pile, banish an Ally.) 
[ATTACK] Physical attack. Search your Life Deck for a Styled [ATTACK] or [DEFENSE] card and discard it. Raise your anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 4 stages. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Red Palm Shot
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
Raise your anger 1 level. Damage from this attack is banished. You may lower your anger 2 levels. If you do, banish the top or bottom 3 cards of your opponent's discard pile. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Saiyan Combative Stance
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. You may only have one Saiyan Combative Stance attached.) 
POWER: Draw a card. Attach to your MP. While attached, once per combat, after you discard a Styled card with Endurance from your hand, gain 3 stages and choose a Styled card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck.

name: Saiyan Flying Kick
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
After you use a HIT effect this combat, lower your opponent's anger 1 level. The next time a card effect causes you to discard a Styled card with Endurance from your hand this combat, draw a card. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Saiyan Quick Strike
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack costing 1 stage. 
If the highest power level on your MP's level 4 is 500000 or less, you may destroy the top card of your Life Deck. If you do, this attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat. 
DAMAGE: 5 stages. HIT: Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Saiyan Forceful Stop
Text:
(This card's Endurance is considered to be 5 for your card effects.) 
[DEFENSE] Stops an energy attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. Your attacks deal +X stages of damage this combat. X = your MP's current level.

name: Saiyan Massacre
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
Banish an opponent's Ally or Setup. 
[MAJIN]: You may banish 4 cards from your discard pile. If you do, Rejuvenate this card after use. 
DAMAGE: 6 life cards. HIT: Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels.

name: Deflection Drill
Text:
(You may only have one Deflection Drill in play. As an action, you may banish this card from your hand to gain 5 stages.)
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when an opponent's card effect would destroy or banish cards from the top of your Life Deck. Destroy that many cards from the top of your opponent's Life Deck instead.

name: Halt
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: [GOD]: If you have 2 or less Traits, use when an Event is played or a Setup Power is used. Cancel the effects of that card. 
(Shuffle into your Life Deck after use.)

name: On The Move!
Text:
(You may banish this card from your hand when an effect would cause a player to skip or pass an action to cancel that effect.) 
[DEFENSE] POWER: Stops a physical or energy attack. 
If that attack was a Physical Combat or Energy Combat card, return it to your opponent's hand. Draw a card. Gain 2 stages or your opponent loses 2 stages. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Reality Check
Text: POWER: Destroy an opponent's Setup, Drill, Ally, or attached card.

name: Concussive Strike
Text:
(If your MP has [MAJIN], this card is considered Styled.) 
[ATTACK] Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. 
[MAJIN]: Choose a player. That player banishes 2 cards from their discard pile. Rejuvenate 2. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages. (Banish after use.)

name: Controlled Energy Burst
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy Attack costing 2 stages. 
Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: your opponent cannot gain anger this combat. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Babidi's Corruption
Text:
(If this card is banished for Endurance, you may discard a card at random from your opponent's hand. If you do, your opponent draws a card.) 
POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for an Ally and play it. You may banish an Ally you control to end combat. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Babidi's Dark Magic
Text:
(This card gains +X Endurance. X = the number of [MAJIN] Allies you control.) 
POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for a [MAJIN] Ally and place it into play at 3 stages above 0. Raise that Ally to its highest power stage or destroy the top X cards of your opponent's Life Deck. X = the number of [MAJIN] Allies you control. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Buu's Candy
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. Whenever this card leaves play, banish the card Buu's Candy was attached to.) 
POWER: Attach to an opponent's Setup in play. Gain control of that Setup and it loses all effects. While attached, you may banish this card as an action to lower your opponent's anger 2 levels and banish the top 2 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

name: Buu's Chocolate
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. Whenever this card leaves play, banish the card Buu's Chocolate was attached to.) 
POWER: Attach to a Drill in play. Gain control of that Drill and it loses all effects. While attached, you may banish this card as an action to raise your anger 1 level and your opponent loses 3 stages.

name: Buu's Cookie
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. Whenever this card leaves play, banish the card Buu's Cookie was attached to.) 
POWER: Attach to an Ally in play. Gain control of that Ally, it loses all effects, and it cannot make actions nor have damage redirected to it. While attached, you may banish this card as an action to gain 2 stages and Rejuvenate 2.

name: Buu's Candy Beam
Text:
(When this card is discarded or destroyed from your Life Deck, you may banish an attached card in play.) 
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
Search your discard pile or Banished Zone for a Named Setup and place it into play or use its Power. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Piccolo's Lethal Chop
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.)
[ATTACK] Physical attack costing 1 stage. Damage from this attack cannot be prevented. You may shuffle a non-MP/non-Mastery card in play back into its owner's Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 6 life cards or 6 stages. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Vegeta's Prideful Challenge
Text:
(Villains only. This card is considered Styled.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Setups, Drills, and Allies cannot be used this combat. Banish up to 3 cards from either player's discard pile. 
[MAJIN]: Draw a card. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Buu - Feasting
Text:
(If your MP is Babidi, you may use this Power regardless of your MP's power stage.) 
[CONSTANT]: After a MAJIN Ally you control leaves play, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. 
[DEFENSE] POWER: Prevent all damage from an energy attack.

name: Dabura - Devil
Text:
(If your MP is Babidi, you may use this Power regardless of your MP's power stage.) 
[CONSTANT]: After a MAJIN Ally enters play under your control, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.
[DEFENSE] POWER: Prevent all damage from a physical attack.

name: Pui Pui - Cocky
Text:
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack costing 1 stage. 
If your MP has [MAJIN], this attack deal +1 life card of damage. 
DAMAGE: 0 life cards. 
HIT: Banish the top X cards of your opponent's discard pile. X = the number of other [MAJIN] Allies you control.

name: Spopovich - Enhanced
Text:
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
DAMAGE: 3 stages. 
HIT: You may destroy an Ally.

name: Yakon - Beastly
Text:
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
If your MP has [MAJIN], this attack deals +1 life card of damage. 
DAMAGE: 0 life cards. 
HIT: Rejuvenate X. X = the number of other [MAJIN] Allies you control.

name: Yamu - Expendable
Text:
(If your MP has MAJIN, you may use this Power regardless of your MP's power stage.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when any number of Allies would leave play. Banish "Yamu, Expendable". Your other [MAJIN] Allies cannot leave play until the beginning of the next action this combat.

name: Babidi - Mastermind
Text:
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Search your Life Deck for a [MAJIN] Ally and play it. That Ally can make actions regardless of your MP's power stage this combat. 
DAMAGE: 2 life cards. 
HIT: Raise your anger X levels. X = the number of [MAJIN] Allies you control.

name: Babidi - Scheming
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Search your discard pile for a [MAJIN] Ally and play it. 
POWER: Banish the bottom 2 cards of your opponent's discard pile. You may destroy an Ally you control. If you do, destroy the top 3 cards of your opponent's Life Deck. Raise or lower a player's anger 1 level.

name: Babidi - Worried
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use at the start of your Planning Step. Search your Life Deck or discard pile for an Ally and play it. 
POWER: Banish the top 2 cards of your opponent's discard pile. Rejuvenate 2. Choose a [MAJIN] Ally you control. The next attack that Ally performs this combat cannot be stopped.

name: Babidi - Controlling
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Allies' PUR is +2. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use at the start of your Planning Step. Search a player's Life Deck, discard pile, or Banished Zone for an Ally and play it. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
DAMAGE: 0 life cards. HIT: Destroy the top X cards of your opponent's Life Deck. X = the number of Allies you control.

name: Buu - Playful
Text:
(At the start of the game, you may search your Life Deck for all copies of Buu's Candy, Buu's Chocolate, and Buu's Cookie and banish them.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your opponent's attacks deal -1 stage of damage. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. Rejuvenate 1. 
DAMAGE: 3 stages. HIT: You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card or Rejuvenate 2.

name: Buu - Abomination
Text:
[CONSTANT]: After taking damage from an attack, Rejuvenate 1. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Choose a card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 6 stage. HIT: Raise your anger 2 levels or Rejuvenate 2.

name: Buu - Monstrous
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever you Rejuvenate, increase that amount by 1. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Rejuvenate the top or bottom card of your discard pile. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Search your discard pile or Banished Zone for a Named Setup and place it into play or use its Power. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages.

name: Buu - Steaming
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Prevent all damage from your opponent's first attack each combat. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after performing a successful attack, It gains "HIT: Search your Life Deck, discard pile, or Banished Zone for a Named Setup and place it into play or use its Power." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
DAMAGE: 8 stages. HIT: Banish all Named Setups you own in play. Rejuvenate 5 for each card banished this way.

name: Vegeta - Untethered Rage
Text:
(When your MP is lowered to this level, you may banish your discard pile to advance your MP 1 level. If you do, discard a card from your hand and you cannot win by MPPV.) 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Your next Styled attack gains "HIT: Raise your anger 2 levels. Use a critical damage effect." 
DAMAGE: 4 stages.

name: Vegeta - Malicious
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage of damage. While the top and bottom cards of your discard pile are Styled, effects cannot end combat nor cause a player to skip or pass an action. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Banish 2 cards from either player's discard pile. You may raise a player's anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages.

name: Vegeta - Relentless
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +2 stages of damage. After you gain anger, you may banish a card from each player's discard pile. 
POWER: Draw the bottom card of your discard pile. Destroy a Setup, Drill, or Ally. If there are no non-Styled cards in your discard pile, destroy a Setup, Drill, or Ally.

Text:

name: Gotenks - Super Saiyan
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks are considered Styled and gain "HIT: Destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
If stopped, search your Life Deck for a Named card and place it into your hand. 
DAMAGE: 6 life cards. HIT: Destroy the top card of each player's Life Deck. Banish the top 5 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

name: Gotenks - Super Saiyan 3
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks are considered Styled and gain "HIT: Destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 1 stage. 
Choose 3 cards in your opponent's discard pile and banish them. You may use this attack a second time this combat. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: You may destroy the top card of your LIfe Deck to gain 5 stages.

name: Buu - Evil Incarnate
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever you perform a copied attack, raise your anger 1 level. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when one of your effects requires you to discard 1 card from your hand. Reveal that card instead. 
POWER: Choose a non-[INSTANT]/non-[CONSTANT] Power of a personality in play that is not "Buu, Evil Incarnate." Use that Power. If that Power is an attack, it is considered a copied attack for your effects.

name: Buu - Looming Threat
Text:
(When you reach this level, search your LIfe Deck or Banished Zone for a Named Setup or Named Drill and place it into play.) 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
If your opponent has used a non-[CONSTANT] personality Power this turn, raise your anger 2 levels and this attack is considered a copied attack. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Buu - Gotenks Absorbed
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when one of your effects requires you to discard 1 card from your hand. Reveal that card instead. 
POWER: Banish a Styled attack from your discard pile. Perform a copy of htat attack.

name: Buu - Gohan Absorbed
Text:
(When you reach this level, search your Life Deck, discard pile, or Banished Zone for a Named Setup or Named Drill and place it into play.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when an effect requires you to discard 1 card from your hand. Reveal that card instead to draw a card. 
POWER: Banish an attack from a player's discard pile. Perform a copy of that attack.

name: Blue Protective Mastery
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your opponent needs 6 anger to advance a personality level. 
[DEFENSE] POWER You may discard a Physical Combat card from your hand to stop an energy attack or an Energy Combat card to stop a physical attack. If you discarded a Blue card, you may raise or lower a player's anger 1.

name: Namekian Knowledge Mastery
Text: [CONSTANT]: Whenever one of your effects during combat Rejuvenates or shuffles cards into your Life Deck, raise your anger 1 level. After a Namek Dragon Ball enters play under your control, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. While you control 1 Dragon Ball, it cannot be captured by a critical damage effect.

name: Orange Adaptive Mastery
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your Drills are not discarded when you advance or lower a personality level. Your energy attacks deal +1 life card. At the end of any combat in which you used a critical damage effect, search your discard pile for a Styled Drill and place it into play.

name: Black Chopping Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage. Whenever your opponent performs an attack, banish the top card of your opponent's discard pile.

name: Black Erasing Drill
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
[CONSTANT]: Whenever you perform a successful energy attack, you may destroy an opponent's Setup or Drill.

name: Black Evasion
Text:
[DEFENSE] Stops an energy attack. 
You may choose a card in your opponent's discard pile. If you do, your opponent Rejuvenates that card and you may place a card from each player's discard pile on top of its owner's Life Deck.

name: Blue Overpowering Drill
Text:
(Villains only. This card is not discarded when advancing a level.) 
[CONSTANT] Whenever you stop an attack, you may raise a player's anger 1 level. Your first copied attack each combat cannot be stopped.

name: Blue Positioning Drill
Text: [CONSTANT] Whenever you stop an attack, place a Styled card from your discard pile on top of your Life Deck.

name: Blue Lunge
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Search the top 5 cards of your Life Deck for a Setup or Drill and place it into play. Put the remaining cards at the bottom of your Life Deck in any order. 
DAMAGE: AT+5 stages.

name: Namekian Growth
Text:
POWER: You may play a Dragon Ball from your hand or Rejuvenate 4. If your MP is level 3 or higher, you may instead search your Life Deck for a Styled card and place it into your hand. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Namekian Confident Burst
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. 
HIT: Search your Life Deck for an Ally and place it into play at 4 stages above 0. If you have Gohan in play, instead search your Life Deck and discard pile for a total of 2 Allies and place them into play at their highest power stage.

name: Namekian Double Strike
Text:
[ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
You may shuffle a Dragon Ball you control back into its owner's Life Deck. If you do, you may use a critical damage effect. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Orange Disaster Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your styled physical attacks deal +2 stages of damage and gain "Raise your anger 1 level."

name: Orange Distracting Drill
Text:
(You may discard this card from your hand to perform a non-Styled physical attack dealing 3 stages of damage.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your AT damage is considered to be 4 for your Styled attacks.

name: Orange Energy Phasing Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Whenever you perform a successful energy attack, you may have it deal -2 life cards of damage. If you do, destroy a Setup or Drill.

name: Red Despair Drill
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +X life cards of damage. X = your current anger level when you perform that attack.

name: Red Restraint
Text:
(If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect, raise your anger 1 level, gain 3 stages, and your next attack this combat deals +2 life cards of damage.) 
[DEFENSE] Stops a physical attack.

name: Red Sacrifice
Text:
(If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect, raise your anger 2 level and damage from your next attack this combat cannot be prevented.) 
[DEFENSE] Stops an energy attack.

name: Saiyan Menace
Text:
(If this card is Rejuvenated, you may place it into play instead.) 
POWER: All of your opponent's personalities lose 3 stages.

name: Saiyan Protection Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your opponent's attacks deal -1 stage and -1 life card of damage. Once per combat after banishing a card for Endurance, you may Rejuvenate that card.

name: Saiyan Strength Test
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. You may only have one "Saiyan Strength Test" attached.) 
POWER: Attach to your MP. Draw a card. While attached, whenever your raise your anger, banish the bottom card of your opponent's discard pile.

name: Tree of Might
Text:
(You may only have one "Tree of Might" attached.) 
POWER: Attach to your MP. While attached, your attacks deal +2 stages of damage. While attached, both players may search their Life Deck for a non-Styled Drill and place it into play when entering combat. Banish this card when you control a Styled Drill.

name: Time is a Warrior's Tool
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
[DEFENSE] POWER: Stops a physical or energy attack. 
Stops all of your opponent's attacks this combat.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 1
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your other Dragon Balls cannot be captured. Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 2
Text: You may lower an MP 1 level.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 3
Text: Draw 3 cards. Place 2 cards from your hand at the bottom of your Life Deck. Raise or lower a player's anger 1 level.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 4
Text: Destroy up to 2 Setups and/or Drills.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 5
Text: Gain 5 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. Draw a card. Rejuvenate 1.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 6
Text: [CONSTANT]: Your MP's PUR is +3. Your opponent's attacks deal -2 stages of damage.

name: Namek Dragon Ball 7
Text: Choose 3 cards from your discard pile and place them on top of your Life Deck or destroy the top 3 cards of your opponent's Life Deck.

name: Black Maximum Shout
Text:
(If this card is destroyed or banished from your Life Deck by one of your effects, you may place it into play.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when your effect would destroy an opponent's card in play. Banish it instead to draw a card. 
POWER: Rejuvenate 2. Banish 2 cards from your opponent's discard pile.

name: Black Bite
Text:
(Heroes only. You may only have one Black Bite attached.) 
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
If you have only 1 Trait, attach to your MP. While attached, your non-Styled attacks gain HIT: Gain 2 stages or banish a card from your opponent's discard pile. 
DAMAGE: AT +3 life cards.

name: Black Brace
Text:
[DEFENSE]: Stops a physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1. Banish 2 cards from your opponent's discard pile. The next time a card is revealed from your hand this combat, gain 5 stages.

name: Black Counter Blast
Text:
(If this card is revealed from your hand by a Mastery effect, you may draw a card. If you do, your opponent draws a card.) 
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. Your opponent can only attack or pass on their next action this combat. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: Lower your opponent's anger 1. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Black Energy Focus
Text:
(If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck by one of your effects, you may banish it to banish the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.) 
[ATTACK] 1: Energy Attack. 
Lower a player's anger 1. 
DAMAGE: 3 life cards. HIT: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. If your MP does not have [ANDROID], your opponent draws a card.

name: Blue Duality Drill
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Attacks performed by your Allies deal +1 life card. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after you Rejuvenate an Ally from your Banished Zone with a Mastery effect. Draw a card. Until the start of your next turn, your maximum hand size is +1 during the Discard Step.

name: Blue Research Drill
Text:
(Heroes only. This card is not discarded when advancing a level.) 
[CONSTANT]: Whenever you stop an attack, you may lower a player's anger 1. Your copied attacks deal +2 life cards.

name: Blue Magic
Text:
POWER: Banish the top or bottom 4 cards of your opponent's discard pile. 
[MAJIN]: Rejuvenate 4. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Blue Duck
Text:
[DEFENSE]: Stops a physical attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 1. Choose up to 2 cards in your discard pile with copy or copied in the text box and place them on top of your Life Deck. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Blue Punishment
Text:
(This attack is considered a copied attack. If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck by one of your effects, you may banish it to lower your opponent's anger 2.) 
[ATTACK] 1: Physical attack. Destroy the top 2 cards of your Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 1 +X life cards. X = the number of cards in your discard pile with copy or copied in the text box to a maximum of 0. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Namekian Rebuke Drill
Text:
(If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect, play it instead.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after an effect discards a Dragon Ball from your hand. Draw a card.

name: Namekian Spin
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
You may shuffle a Dragon Ball back into its owner's LIfe Deck. If you do, banish X cards from your opponent's discard pile. X = the number of Dragon Balls you own in play. 
DAMAGE: AT +3 stages.

name: Namekian Swift Guard
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. If this card is discarded from your hand by a Mastery effect, you may banish it instead to draw 2 cards. If you do, discard a card from your hand.) 
[DEFENSE]: Stops a physical attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 1.

name: Namekian Aggressive Burst
Text:
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. 
Damage from this attack cannot be modified. If you control no Dragon Balls, Remain 1. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: Raise your anger 1. Lower your opponent's anger 1. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Namekian Versatility
Text:
(This card is considered a [ATTACK] card for your Mastery effects. If this card would be placed into your hand by a card effect, you may banish it instead to draw a card and banish the top 3 cards of your opponent's discard pile.) 
[DEFENSE]: Stops an energy attack. 
Raise your anger 1.

name: Orange Provoking Drill
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck. Orange Adept Mastery only. 
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. If you control less than 5 Drills, destroy a Setup or Drill.

name: Orange Gift
Text:
POWER: Search your LIfe Deck for a Drill and place it into play. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Orange Power Rush
Text:
(You cannot win by MPPV if you play this card.) 
Physical attack. Your Styled physical attacks are unpreventable this combat. 
DAMAGE: AT +2 stages. HIT: Banish any number of Drills you control. Raise your anger X. X = the number of Drills you banished. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Orange Wrist Block
Text:
[DEFENSE]: Stops a physical attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 1. If you control less than 5 Drills, your Styled attacks deal +2 stages this combat.

name: Orange Foot Blast
Text:
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. 
HIT: Draw a card. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Red Healing Drill
Text:
(If this card is discarded from your hand by an effect, you may place it into play.) 
[CONSTANT]: After an effect discards a card from your hand, search your discard pile for a card and shuffle it into your Life Deck. 
POWER: Lower a player's anger 1.

name: Red Quick Block
Text:
(If this card is discarded from your hand by an effect, you may banish it to gain 5 stages. 
[DEFENSE]: Stops a physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1. You may lower your anger X. If you do, lower your opponent's anger X.

name: Red Uppercut
Text:
[ATTACK] Focused physical attack. 
DAMAGE: AT +2 stages. 
HIT: Destroy a Setup, Drill or Ally. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Red Clap
Text:
(If this card is discarded from your hand by a Mastery effect, rearrange the bottom 3 cards of your discard pile.) 
[DEFENSE]: Stops an energy attack. 
Raise your anger 1. Gain 5 stages.

name: Red Clearing Blast
Text:
(When this attack is performed from your discard pile, Rejuvenate 3 cards from the bottom of your discard pile.)
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. 
Raise your anger 1. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: Banish X cards from your opponent's discard pile. X = your current anger level.

name: Saiyan Brace
Text:
(If this card is Rejuvenated during combat, destroy the top card of a player's Life Deck.) 
[DEFENSE]: Prevent 3 life cards and 3 stages of damage from an attack. 
Destroy the top 2 cards of a player's Life Deck.

name: Saiyan Distortion Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: If your MP is level 2, your opponent's effects cannot lower your MP's personality level. Whenever an effect would raise your anger, you may lower a player's anger 1 instead.

name: Saiyan Shattering Strike
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 2. 
DAMAGE: AT +4 stages. 
HIT: Your cards with printed Endurance have their Endurance set to 3 this combat.

name: Saiyan Desperate Blast
Text:
(If this card is destroyed from your LIfe Deck by one of your effects, you may banish it to search your discard pile for a Styled Drill and play it.) 
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. You may destroy the top 3 cards of your Life Deck. If you do, this attack deals +3 life cards and is Unpreventable. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Saiyan Energy Evasion
Text:
(If this card is Rejuvenated by a Mastery effect, destroy the top card of your opponent's LIfe Deck.) 
[DEFENSE]: Stops an energy attack. 
Destroy the top card of a player's Life Deck.

name: All You Need is the Ground
Text:
(You may shuffle this card from your hand into your Life Deck as an action to lower a player's anger 2.) 
POWER: Players can only gain anger from the effects of Physical Combat and Energy Combat cards this turn.

name: Showdown Drill
Text: [CONSTANT]: Players cannot draw cards from their non-Mastery effects.

name: Cataclysmic Blast
Text:
(Villains only.) 
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack. Allies lose all effects this combat. Destroy an Ally. 
DAMAGE: 3 life cards. HIT: Shuffle into your Life Deck after use. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Knee Clash
Text:
(Heroes only.) 
[DEFENSE]: Stops a physical or energy attack. 
If you have 2 or less Traits, lower a player's anger 1 and the next time your opponent would raise their anger this combat, change that amount to 0. 
(Banish after use.)

name: WUPHF!
Text:
(Limit 1 per deck.) 
POWER: Banish a Setup, Drill, Ally or attached card. If Bee is in play, shuffle into your Life Deck after use.

name: Buu's Company
Text:
(You may play this card during your Planning Step. You may only have one Buu's Company attacked.) 
POWER: Attach to your MP. Search your Life Deck or Banished Zone for an Ally named Bee or Hercule and play it. While attached, at the end of your turn, you may play an Ally named Bee or Hercule from your discard pile.

name: Pikkon's Taunt
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when your opponent performs an attack. The immediate effects of that attack become HIT effects instead. Draw a card. 
(Banish after use.)

name: Android 17 - Ranger
Text:
(Once per game, if your MP is Android 18, you may play this card from your hand as an action to end combat.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks with Android in the title are Unpreventable.

name: Bee - Loyal Companion
Text:
(Buu only. This card is considered Named. You cannot win by MPPV if you advance a personality level with this card. Once per game, after an opponent's effect causes this card to leave play, advance your MP 1 level.) 
[CONSTANT]: If your MP is Buu, your personalities can use their non-[INSTANT] Powers a second time each combat.

name: Hercule - Best Buddy
Text:
(If your MP is Buu or Videl, you may use this Power regardless of your MP's power stage.) 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise or lower a player's anger 1. If this is not the first time you have used this Power this combat, gain 3 stages and Rejuvenate the bottom 3 cards of your discard pile. 
DAMAGE: 1 life card.

name: King Yemma - Arbiter of Fate
Text: [CONSTANT]: When a player would win the game by MPPV, once per game, set both players' anger to 0 instead and banish this card.

name: Bibidi - Progenitor
Text: [CONSTANT]: If your MP has [MAJIN], your attacks deal +1 life card. Attacks performed by personalities with [MAJIN] deal +1 life card.

name: Buu - Wild Card
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage. 
POWER: You may search your Life Deck for a non-Styled card and banish it. Draw a card.

name: Buu - Crazed
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks gain "HIT: Rejuvenate 1." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
If stopped, draw a card. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages. HIT: Lower a player's anger 1.

name: Buu - Destructive
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 stage. Your styled attacks gain "HIT: Rejuvenate 1." 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Banish 2 cards from a player's discard pile. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Unpreventable. If stopped, banish the top 2 cards of a player's Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 7 stages.

name: Buu - Unhinged
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +2 stages and gain "HIT: Rejuvenate 1." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Unpreventable. If stopped, banish the top or bottom 3 cards of a player's Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 7 stages. HIT: Banish 5 cards from a player's discard pile.

name: Buu - Ready to Fight
Text:
(Your Life Deck cannot include Allies not named Bee or Hercule.) 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Search your Life Deck for a Named card and place it into your hand. Banish a card from your hand. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
DAMAGE: 2 life cards. HIT: Raise or lower a player's anger 1.

name: Buu - Cultivating Mass
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your opponent's attacks deal -1 stage and -1 life card. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Raise your anger 1. Choose an Ally in your Banished Zone and place it on top of your discard pile. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. HIT: Rejuvenate the bottom card of your discard pile.

name: Buu - Devastated
Text:
[CONSTANT]: If a Bee or Hercule Ally is in your discard pile or Banished Zone, your attacks deal +2 life cards and gain "HIT: Raise your anger 1." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Destroy an Ally or Setup. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. HIT: Search your discard pile for a card and Rejuvenate it.

name: Buu - Pissed
Text:
(You cannot win by MPPV. When you reach this level, destroy all Allies in play.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +3 life cards. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Unstoppable by Events if you do not control an Ally. Raise your anger 2. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. HIT: Rejuvenate the bottom 2 cards of your discard pile.

name: Goku - Super Saiyan 3
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +2 stages. Your opponent's attacks deal -2 life cards. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Unstoppable. Lower your MP 1 level at the end of combat. 
DAMAGE: 8 stages.

name: Tenshinhan - Heroic
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your non-Styled attacks deal +1 life card. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack. 
Destroy the top card of your Life Deck. You may use this attack a second time this combat. 
DAMAGE: 2 life cards. HIT: Raise or lower a player's anger 1.

name: Android 18 - Settled Down
Text:
(Your attacks with Android in the title are considered Styled.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks cost -1 stage (to a minimum of 0). 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 1 stage. Raise your anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 2 life cards. HIT: Search your discard pile for a Styled card or card with Android in the title and Rejuvenate it.

name: Android 18 - Aggressive
Text:
(Your attacks with Android in the title are considered Styled.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks cost -1 stage (to a minimum of 0). 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. Search your discard pile for a Styled card or card with Android in the title and Rejuvenate it. If stopped, search your Life Deck for a card with Android in the title and place it into your hand. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Android 18 - Finalist
Text:
(Your attacks with Android in the title are considered Styled.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks cost -2 stage (to a minimum of 0). 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Search your Life Deck for a card with Android in the title and place it into your hand. 
POWER: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. Search your discard pile for a Styled card or card with Android in the title and Rejuvenate it.

name: Android 18 - Runner Up
Text:
(Your attacks with Android in the title are considered Styled. When you reach this level, search your discard pile and/or Banished Zone for 2 Styled cards and/or cards with Android in the title and Rejuvenate them.) 
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks cost -1 stage (to a minimum of 0) and deal +2 life cards of damage. 
POWER: Search your Life Deck, discard pile, or Banished Z0ne for a card with Android in the title and place it into your hand.

name: Gohan - Enhanced
Text:
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after you Rejuvenate during combat. Raise your anger 1 level. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1 level. Search your discard pile for a Styled card and Rejuvenate it. 
DAMAGE: 4 stages.

name: Gohan - Mystic
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your styled attacks deal +1 stage of damage. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after you Rejuvenate during combat. Gain 4 stages. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Rejuvenate 2. Raise your anger 1 level. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages.

name: Gohan - Ultimate
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage. 
POWER: Choose up to 3 Styled cards in your discard pile. Your opponent chooses 1 of those cards. Place the chosen card into your hand. Rejuvenate the remaining cards.

name: Gohan - Earth's Defender
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +2 stages and +2 life cards of damage. Your attacks cannot be stopped by Event cards. 
POWER: Gain 4 stages. Rejuvenate 4. Draw a card.

name: Goku - Super Saiyan 3
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +2 stages. Your opponent's attacks deal -2 life cards. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Unstoppable. Lower your MP 1 level at the end of combat. 
DAMAGE: 8 stages.

name: Krillin - Settled Down
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever a Setup enters play under your control, gain 2 stages. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
At the end of combat, search your Life Deck for a Styled Setup and place it into play. 
DAMAGE: 4 life cards. 
HIT: Raise or lower a player's anger 1 level.

name: Krillin - In Training
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever a Setup enters play under your control, gain 2 stages. 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use at the end of combat. Search your Life Deck for a Styled Setup or Styled Drill and place it into play. 
[DEFENSE]: Prevent all damage from an attack.

name: Krillin - Z-Warrior
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever a Setup enters play under your control, gain 2 stages. Whenever a Setup or Drill enters play under your control during combat, Rejuvenate 1. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. Search your Life Deck for a Styled Setup or Styled Drill and place it into play. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. 
HIT: Rejuvenate 3. Choose 3 cards in your opponent's discard pile and banish them.

name: Krillin - Victorious
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever a Setup enters play under your control, gain 2 stages. Whenever a Setup or Drill enters play under your control during combat, Rejuvenate 1 and banish the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Energy attack costing 2 stages. 
You may use this attack a second time this combat. 
DAMAGE: 5 life cards. HIT: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for a Setup or Drill and place it into play.

name: Buu - Wild Card
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks deal +1 stage. 
POWER: You may search your Life Deck for a non-Styled card and banish it. Draw a card.

Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks gain "HIT: Rejuvenate 1." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
If stopped, draw a card. 
DAMAGE: 6 stages. HIT: Lower a player's anger 1.

name: Buu - Destructive
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 stage. Your styled attacks gain "HIT: Rejuvenate 1." 
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Banish 2 cards from a player's discard pile. 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. Unpreventable. If stopped, banish the top 2 cards of a player's Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 7 stages.

name: Buu - Unhinged
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +2 stages and gain "HIT: Rejuvenate 1." 
POWER: [ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Unpreventable. If stopped, banish the top or bottom 3 cards of a player's Life Deck. 
DAMAGE: 7 stages. HIT: Banish 5 cards from a player's discard pile.

name: Black Conflict Mastery
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your attacks that deal at least 4 life cards of damage are considered to deal critical damage. 
POWER: Discard a card from your hand. If that card was Styled, your MP gains 6 stages or you may raise or lower a player's anger 1.

name: Black Perceptive Mastery
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Your Styled attacks gain "HIT: Destroy an opponent's Setup or Drill."

(If this card is banished from your Life Deck or discard pile by one of your effects and you have not searched your Life Deck this turn, search your Life Deck or Banished Zone for a Dragon Ball and place it into play.)
POWER: Search your Life Deck, discard pile, or Banished Zone for a Drill and play it.
(Banish after use.)

name: Red Embarrassing Drill
Text: [INSTANT] POWER: Use when one of your effects requires you to lower your anger. You may reduce that amount to 0.

name: Red Double Strike
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack.
Raise your anger 1. Remain 1.
DAMAGE: AT stages.

name: Red Shoulder Grab
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack.
Raise your anger 1. Your other attacks are considered to deal critical damage this combat.
DAMAGE: AT +3 stages.

name: Red Energy Blast
Text:
[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack.
Raise your anger 1. Banish a Drill or Ally.
DAMAGE: 4 life cards.

name: Saiyan Peace
Text:
(Limit 2 per deck.)
[INSTANT] POWER: Use after your opponent advances a personality level. You may set your anger to 0. If you do, lower your opponent's MP 1 level.
(Banish after use.)

name: Saiyan Rescue
Text:
(You may only have one "Saiyan Rescue" attached.)
POWER: Attach to your MP. Rejuvenate 1. While attached, once per turn as an action you may choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it.

name: Saiyan Spin Kick
Text:
[ATTACK] Physical attack.
Raise your anger 1. Lower your opponent's anger 1. Destroy an Ally.
DAMAGE: AT +3 stages.

name: Saiyan Burst

[ATTACK] 2: Energy attack.
Raise your anger 1. Lower your opponent's anger 3.

HIT: Choose a Styled card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it.

name: Saiyan Tracking Blast
Text:
(You cannot win by MPPV if you use this card.)

Attach to your MP. While attached, your opponent's effects cannot lower your MP's personality level. Banish this card after your opponent uses an effect that would have lowered your MP's personality level.
DAMAGE: 5 life cards.

name: Concussive Strike

(If your MP has [MAJIN], this card is considered Styled.)

Raise your anger 1. Lower your opponent's anger 2. [MAJIN]: Choose a player. That player banishes 2 cards from their discard pile. Rejuvenate 2.
DAMAGE: 6 stages. (Banish after use.)

name: Dashing Sword Attack

[ATTACK] 1: Physical attack. Your opponent's MP loses 2 stages. Lower your opponent's anger 1.

HIT: Search your discard pile for a Styled or Named card with "Sword" in the title and place it into your hand.
(Banish after use.)

name: Devastating Blow

[ATTACK] Physical attack.
Raise your anger 1. Lower your opponent's anger 2. Banish 3 cards from your opponent's discard pile.

name: Shoulder Slam

[ATTACK] Physical attack.
Raise your anger 1. Lower your opponent's anger 3.

name: Energy Toss

[EARTHLING]: If you have only 1 Trait, banish 3 cards from your opponent's discard pile and this attack deals +2 life cards.

name: Trunks' Sword Stance

(You cannot win by MPPV if you use this card.)
[INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Name a card. Reveal the top card of your Life Deck. If the revealed card matches the card you named, raise your anger 6. You may shuffle your Life Deck.
(Banish after use.)

name: Trunks' Knee Bash

(This card is considered to have "Sword" in the title for your card effects.)
[ATTACK] Physical attack.
Banish a Seyup, Drill, or attached card.
DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. HIT: Raise your anger 1.

name: Trunks' Slam

(This card is considered Styled.)
[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Raise your anger 1. If you stopped an attack on your opponent's last action this combat, your opponent passes for their next action this combat.

[ATTACK] 1: Physical attack. Banish up to 6 cards from a player's discard pile.

(Banish after use.)

(Villains only. This card is considered Styled.)

(Banish after use.)

[ATTACK] : 3: Energy attack. This attack can only be stopped by an Energy Combat card. Raise your anger 2. Players can only attack or pass in their actions this combat.

HIT: You may lower your MP 1 level. If you do, your opponent discards a random card from their hand.
(Banish after use.)

(Created by Josh Duquette, OP1 East Kai Champion)

name: Blue Stylish Pose

(Limit 1 per deck.)

(Limit 1 per deck.)

[INSTANT] POWER: [EARTHLING]: If you have 2 or less Traits, use after performing a successful Styled or Named attack that has 'Sword' in the title. That attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat.

(Once per combat, as an action, you may place this card into play to choose a Styled card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it.)

name: Nail - Warrior
Text:
[CONSTANT]: Whenever your opponent stops one of your attacks, destroy the top card of their Life Deck. 
INSTANT POWER: Use when you perform a Styled attack. Your MP pays 1 stage to make that attack gain, "If stopped, use this attack's HIT effects" and "Banish after use."

name: Black Face Crush

[ATTACK] Physical attack. 
Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. 
DAMAGE: AT+4 stages. HIT: Search your LIfe Deck for a Styled card that can attach to a MP and place it into play attached.

[ATTACK] Physical attack costing 1 stage. Allies cannot make actions nor have damage redirected to them this combat.

If your opponent cannot win by MPPV, destroy any number of cards attached to your MP. Lower your opponent's MP level equal to the number of cards destroyed this way.

While attached, you may banish this card as an action to perform an energy attack dealing X life cards. X = the number of counters on this card.
